name: Detective Chin Chillettoni
description:
During an informal dinner, a blackout occured in the house of Madame Purr.
In those few minutes, her most precius jewel, "le collar d'or", was stolen.
Fortunally this is my neighborhood, detective Chin Chillettoni, ready to take the case under my tiny and capable paws.

For the Mini Jam 60: Crime (Sorry for the english, we'll fix it soon)
